repos.name: assemble
repos.description: Static site generator for Grunt.js, Yeoman and Node.js. Used by H5BP/Effeckt, Topcoat, Web Experience Toolkit, and hundreds of other projects to build sites, themes, components, documentation, blogs and gh-pages.

repos.name: assemble-contrib-contextual
repos.description: Generates a JSON file containing the context of each page. Basic plugin to help see what's happening in the build.

repos.name: assemble-contrib-rss
repos.description: Plugin for creating RSS feeds with Assemble, the static site generator for Node.js, Grunt.js and Yeoman.

repos.name: assemble-contrib-sitemap
repos.description: Sitemap generator plugin for Assemble

repos.name: assemble-docs
repos.description: Documentation for Assemble and related projects.

repos.name: assemble-front-matter
repos.description: Utilities for extracting Front Matter from source files.

repos.name: assemble-handlebars
repos.description: Assemble engine plugin for Handlebars templates

repos.name: assemble-internal
repos.description: Internal tools and tasks for managing Assemble projects.

repos.name: assemble-less
repos.description: Grunt task for compiling LESS to CSS.

repos.name: assemble-liquid
repos.description: Assemble engine plugin for LiquidNode templates http://assemble.io

repos.name: assemble-manifest
repos.description: Proof of concept to generate JSON and/or YAML manifest files from given source files or directories.

repos.name: assemble-package-manager
repos.description: Provides utilities for loading packages to work with their file configurations

repos.name: assemble-swig
repos.description: Assemble engine plugin for swig templates.

repos.name: assemble-utils
repos.description: Assemble utilities

repos.name: assemble-yaml
repos.description: Utility for extracting and converting YAML Front Matter from files.

repos.name: boilerplate-bootstrap
repos.description: Build Bootstrap with Assemble instead of Jekyll.

repos.name: boilerplate-gist-blog
repos.description: Use Assemble to create a blog from GitHub Gists.

repos.name: boilerplate-h5bp
repos.description: Assemble + HTML5 Boilerplate.

repos.name: boilerplate-markdown
repos.description: Use Assemble to generate HTML pages from markdown content. Useful for wikis, gh-pages, documentation and blogs or sites with markdown posts.

repos.name: boilerplate-site
repos.description: Demonstrates how to use Assemble to build a site. Includes layouts, pages, partials, and markdown content.

repos.name: boilerplate-sitemap
repos.description: Generate a sitemap with Assemble.

repos.name: boilerplate-swig
repos.description: Example of using swig templates with Assemble.

repos.name: boilerplates
repos.description: A bunch of example projects to help you learn how to use Assemble.

repos.name: buttons
repos.description: Sooo many buttons... is this really necessary?! In reality this project has little to do with buttons. It's an exercise in separation of concerns regarding structure, style, content and data.

repos.name: example-layout-helpers
repos.description: An example using the layout helpers

repos.name: generator-assemble
repos.description: Yeoman generator for Assemble, the static site generator built on Grunt.js. Kickstart new Assemble projects in just a few seconds, including templates, data, layouts, and a theme.

repos.name: glob-object
repos.description: Globbing for objects and properties.

repos.name: grunt-assemble
repos.description: Moved to https://github.com/assemble/assemble

repos.name: grunt-convert
repos.description: Grunt task to convert to or from JSON, YAML, XML, PLIST or CSV.

repos.name: grunt-data
repos.description: Grunt plugin for manipulating data.

repos.name: grunt-firebase
repos.description: Grunt task for updating firebase data.

repos.name: grunt-github-api
repos.description: Grunt plugin used to query the Github API and save the returned JSON files locally.

repos.name: grunt-github-api-example
repos.description: This is an example repository for:

repos.name: grunt-init-assemble
repos.description: Grunt init template for Assemble, the static site generator built on Grunt.js. Kickstart new Assemble projects in just a few seconds, including templates, data, layouts, and a theme.

repos.name: grunt-init-assemble-plugin
repos.description: Generate a plugin for Assemble.

repos.name: grunt-init-basic
repos.description: grunt-init template for a very basic project. includes nodeunit tests, jshint, watch, clean, and assemble for converting readme to a simple gh-pages index page.

repos.name: grunt-init-ghpages
repos.description: Quickly build gh-pages documentation from a project README using Grunt.js and Assemble, a Node.js alternative to Jekyll.

repos.name: grunt-init-helper
repos.description: Grunt init template for creating Assemble helpers.

repos.name: grunt-matter
repos.description: Add, extend, sort, and strip YAML front matter. Also has options for populating randomized mock data.

repos.name: grunt-readme
repos.description: Generate your README from a template. Fast, very little config, and if you already use Grunt it's a no-brainer.

repos.name: gruntjs.com
repos.description: Grunt's Website

repos.name: handlebars-helpers
repos.description: Library of 120+ handlebars helpers for any project: Assemble, Ghost, YUI... This project is active and supported, we love contributors and appreciate stars.

repos.name: handlebars-helpers-examples
repos.description: Shows how to use helpers from helper-lib with Assemble.

repos.name: less-tests
repos.description: Test suite for LESS.js

repos.name: lodash-mixins
repos.description: Collection of mixins for Underscore or Lo-Dash. This project is active and supported, we love contributors and appreciate watchers.

repos.name: metadata
repos.description: Utils for working with document metadata.

repos.name: pagination
repos.description: Nothing to see yet, this repo will eventually contain examples and boilerplate code for adding paging and pagination to your projects with Assemble.

repos.name: permalinks
repos.description: Permalinks plugin for Assemble, the static site generator for Grunt.js and Yeoman. This plugin enables powerful and configurable URI replacement patterns, presets, uses Moment.js for parsing dates, and much more.

repos.name: plugins
repos.description: Collection of plugins maintained by the Assemble core team.

repos.name: refactor-planning
repos.description: Temporary repo to plan the refactoring of Assemble. if you use Assemble and have opinions about this, please add your voice to the issues.

repos.name: swig-extensions
repos.description: A growing collection of tags and filters for Swig Templates.

repos.name: task-manifest
repos.description: Task Manifests are a convention for defining paths for files to be consumed by a build process. More to come...

repos.name: tasks
repos.description: Collection of Grunt plugins maintained by the Assemble core team.
